description: Rickee wanted to borrow Bradleys MP3 player, but Bradley had other ideas. He was going to make his friend work for it. He put it somewhere he would have to prove his desire to get it. In his pants. Rickee was hesitant at first, but in seconds he was on his knees with a cock in his mouth. Not long after that he was fucking his friends ass and making music better than what was on that damn music player. It was requited love, to be sure. They proved it by cumming on each others cocks, balls and bellies.
title: The Big Stick
